text:
It's been just over a month since Beyoncé gave birth to twins Rumi and Sir Carter, and gifted the world that insanely beautiful post-birth photograph.

This content is imported from Instagram. You may be able to find the same content in another format, or you may be able to find more information, at their web site.

So, what better way to celebrate a night out the town without her newborns by dancing backstage with her sister Solange during Missy Elliot's FYF Fest performance in Los Angeles over the weekend.

Missy announced the new mum was standing on the sidelines during her performance and reportedly said, 'Hey Girl!', before giving a shout-out to her other fellow musical contemporaries Solange, Katy Perry and Tyler the Creator.

Getty Images

On Saturday morning, the 'Lose Control' rapper posted a photo of her as the jam between a delicious Beyoncé-Solange sandwich on her Instagram Stories feed, and captioned the snap: 'Big [shout-out] to my good sis @saintrecords & my sis @beyonce they have always showed me love and supported me since day one! Over a decade. Love y'all!

This content is imported from Instagram. You may be able to find the same content in another format, or you may be able to find more information, at their web site.

During the concert, Beyoncé was also spotted cutting some shapes to Missy's gig alongside Icelandic singer Björk, wearing round sunglasses and a mint-green jacket.

This content is imported from Instagram. You may be able to find the same content in another format, or you may be able to find more information, at their web site.

Queen Bee's night out comes several weeks after she was photographed with her husband at rapper Vic Mensa's debut album The Autobiography listening party in Los Angeles, a night before her twins' debut to Instagram.

If only we had Beyoncé's energy this morning!
authors: Katie O Malley Is The Deputy Digital Editor
title: Beyoncé Dances Like Nobody Is Watching At Miss Elliott Concert With Sister Solange

og.title: Beyoncé Dances Like Nobody Is Watching At Missy Elliott Concert
og.description: It was a girls' night out for the star

meta_data.title: Beyoncé Dances Like Nobody Is Watching At Miss Elliott Concert With Sister Solange
meta_data.description: The 35-year-old left her new babies at home with Jay-Z to enjoy a night of dancing with her sister, Solange, at a Missy Elliott gig. As you do.
